description: A moment of lighthearted banter between two scientists in a lab, highlighting the humor found in their shared profession.
title: No Reaction
n_1: Alex and Jordan stand in a cluttered lab, surrounded by beakers and test tubes.
c1_1: Hey, want to hear a chemistry joke?
c2_1: Sure, I could use a laugh.
n_2: Alex grins, ready with his punchline, while Jordan waits expectantly.
c1_2: I’d tell you a chemistry joke but I know I wouldn’t get a reaction.
c2_2: Oh, you got one! A groan.
n_3: Both share a moment of silence, looking at each other.
c1_3: Was it too much of a periodic table joke for you?
c2_3: No, it just didn't react the way you expected.
n_4: They chuckle together, appreciating the humor in their field.
c1_4: I guess it's all about the element of surprise.
